name: Image Convert
description: You can choose to convert a specific image or multiple pictures to the mainstream format, including JPG, PNG, and WEBP. It allows you to quickly convert all selected images to the same file type with one click or convert them to different formats via custom selection.

apps.name: Image Convert
apps.description: You can choose to convert a specific image or multiple pictures to the mainstream formats, including JPG, PNG, and WEBP. It allows you to quickly convert all selected images to the same file type with one click or convert them to different formats via custom selection.

subname: Convert the image file format to any mainstream format.
